name: sand
example_en: The children built a castle out of sand at the beach.
example_cn: 孩子们在海滩上用沙子建造了一座城堡。
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'sand'，与德语 'Sand' 同源。联想记忆：想象沙滩上的细沙，或者沙漏中的沙子流动。图像记忆：想象一个装满沙子的沙漏，或者一个孩子在沙滩上玩耍。

image_prompt.main_image: A close-up view of golden sand with a few seashells scattered around, under bright sunlight.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of children happily building a sandcastle on a sunny beach, with waves gently crashing in the background.
